Compliance description: Ensure the code implements authentication, authorization, and encryption for model security.
Verify if the code specifies the deployment platform (on-premises, cloud, or edge devices).
Check if the code includes Docker or Kubernetes for deploying the model in a containerized environment.
Evaluate whether the code correctly implements storage solutions, such as data lakes, warehouses, or distributed systems, based on requirements.
Check if the code masks or anonymizes sensitive data while preserving analytical utility.
Verify if the code includes strategies for handling failures, security threats, or biases.
Ensure the code maintains logs of predictions, failures, and user feedback for debugging.
